column5: sentence
The though did make my nerves skyrocket
It would wind me up
I was like a cat on a hot tin roof
I will be bouncing off the ceiling
The thought drove me up the wall
Panic stations would be on high alert
It sent my nerves through the roof
I would be off the chart
My nerves rose
I would be a nervous wreck
The lid flew off and everything came out
I will be shaking like a leaf
I could not contain my fears
I would be struck down by fear
I could not shake the nervous feelin
Anxiety will make my patience run out
I had reached rock bottom
I would fall into the abyss
I was sucked into a black hole
The sinking feeling will come on
Talking with her brought me down
Dark clouds will bear down on me
Things went rapidly downhill
I would feel totally deflated
The experience was draining
I would feel downtrodden
I was at the bottom of the barrel
It can make me feel low and numb
It made my mood nosedive
I would feel a lesser person
I descended into oblivion
I would be down in the dumps
Its within reach
They moved the goalposts
I am over her
The job is beneath me
I made a pig of myself
That horse has bolted
Back to square one
Was like a broken record
My time had arrived
The virus returned
Time flies
The cruel sea
Strike while the iron is hot
She ghosted me
The big day loomed large
One step at a time
